On Fri, 22 Nov 2002 DanielBook@... wrote:

> <PRE>Ok, I was finally able to catch what the error says.  All the previous times
> everything had closed before I could read it.  The error says that it
> couldn't load                 saved game save0.  I tried to find some of my
> old saved game files and import them but couldn't find them.  Got any
> suggestions?

Hmm.. Interesting. Its supposed to save save0 before loading any levels,
although maybe its failing to do that. Try doing the following:

1. Make sure there is a save/ directory in the directory where you
put Openglad.
2. Make sure that the directory you put openglad is the same as the one
that is specified by the "data" option in openglad.cfg
3. If you havn't done so, try launching Openglad through an MSDOS prompt
from the directory that it was installed into (ie, cd C:\Openglad and then
execute openglad.exe)

If that still doesn't fix it, make a new team, save the game, and then
copy save1.gtl into save0.gtl and try it then. If even that doesn't fix
it, http://snowstorm.sourceforge.net/save0.gtl and put it in your save/
dir, then see if that works.

- Zardus
